text: The voiceless dental fricative is a type of consonant. The letter for this sound in the International Phonetic Alphabet is ⟨⟩. The X-SAMPA symbol for this sound is `⟨T⟩`. The English language has this sound, and it is the sound represented by the "th" in thing and thanks. ==Features== ==Examples== Language Language Word IPA Meaning Albanian Albanian 'says' Arabic
